title: Ambrogio Remote
description:
AMBROGIO REMOTE is specifically created for Ambrogio customers, to let them have a more userfriendly and interactive experience with their robotic lawn mower.
EASY SETTING  – Easily set up all the settings directly from your smartphone. 
BE UPDATE  –Stay tuned with the latest updates and upgrade your Ambrogio  directly through your App. Download manuals.
HAVE FUN – Drive Tech Robot manually through your garden and play with your family and friends.
REMOTE CONTROL – For latest mower. Connect and interact with the robot every time and everywhere.  Verify location isolate and/or work on specific areas of the garden, monitor the status of the robot and receive alerts when it comes out of the garden.

REMOTE CONTROL – For latest mower. Connect and interact with the robot every time and everywhere. Verify location isolate and/or work on specific areas of the garden, monitor the status of the robot and receive alerts when it comes out of the garden.
